ratings.question_text: Your level of engagement with the course was:
What is your overall assessment of this course?
The course was well organized to facilitate student learning.
I received clear feedback that improved my learning.
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the level of intellectual challenge of this course was:
Relative to other courses you have taken at Yale, the workload of this course was:

narratives.question_text: What knowledge, skills, and insights did you develop by taking this course?
comments: I was able to gain a deeper understanding of Spanish grammar-- before it was mostly just dipping my feet into the different areas of grammar rules, but this class allowed me to dig deeper and learn more about the nuances and the culture.
I learned SO MUCH from this course!!

narratives.question_text: What are the strengths and weaknesses of this course and how could it be improved?
comments: Very thorough and rigorous exploration of advanced concepts in grammar. Not much to improve the course, it is what it is. Kind of boring, but when is grammar not boring- definitely helps improve one's spanish grammar. While I would have liked more speaking, it was made clear that its not largely a conversation course. More a failing on the department for not offering more speaking-based classes than a problem with the class, given its purpose is to teach grammar.
There was a high level of engagement and constant work to be doing so it was helpful in that sense; it may be improved by practicing dialogue and conversation more, or maybe doing activities.
Fantastic teaching style. Love the powerpoints and the handouts!! Very helpful.

narratives.question_text: Would you recommend this course to another student? Please explain.
comments: If you want an advanced grammar class, yes. If you don't, no.

Yes, I would recommend it to another student if they were interested in learning more grammar and improving their writing skills. It will not be as helpful conversationally, but it will allow them to understand certain grammar rules.
